Title: Quran Recitation for Kids
Subtitle: Correct & Fluent Qur'an Recitation for Kids

FAQ.Question: Is it just reading?
FAQ.Answer: No. It builds skills, discipline, and emotional connection.

FAQ.Question: Can my child start with zero Arabic?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. Designed for non-Arab & English-speaking kids.

FAQ.Question: Is Tajwīd difficult for kids?
FAQ.Answer: No. Taught through practice, not theory.

FAQ.Question: Will my child read confidently alone?
FAQ.Answer: Yes. Fluency training prepares them for independence.

FAQ.Question: How are mistakes handled?
FAQ.Answer: With patience and guidance — never pressure.

Sections.Heading: About Course
Sections.Content: A structured program that teaches children correct, fluent Qur'an recitation step by step — from Arabic letters to independent reading. Focuses on pronunciation, Tajwīd accuracy, confidence, and love for the Qur'an.

Sections.Heading: Who is it for?
Content: Children who memorize without proper Tajwīd
Children who need structure or lose focus easily

Tajwīd for Kids (Practical & Simple)
